SELECT o.reservation_id reservation_id, o.product_id product_id, o.quantity quantity, r.reservation_date reservation_date, r.cancel_date cancel_date, r.user_id user_id, r.status_id status_id, r.timeslot_id timeslot_id, p.product_name product_name, c.category_name category_name
FROM ORDER_INFORMATION o
INNER JOIN RESERVATION_ORDER r ON o.reservation_id = r.reservation_id
INNER JOIN PRODUCT p ON o.product_id = p.product_id
INNER JOIN CATEGORY c ON p.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE r.reservation_date >= #{search_init_date} AND r.reservation_date < date_add(#{search_finish_date}, interval 1 day)
